title: Lag Spikes/High MS
body: whenever i play i always get high ms and i dont know why. this started like 3 days ago and its very annoying. it happens randomly and sometimes its not just me but other teamates. its not my internet so idk if its Riot's servers. i will go from 48 ms to 150-200ms at random times. i tried the hextech repair tool and firewall/java update. i dont know what else it could be. any help appreciated

replies.body: If the high ping has been consistent over the last 3 days then there may be a problem with your connection.  Even if your internet seems okay, you can still have issues keeping a strong connection specific servers, like our game servers.  As a first step, go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any local issues.  I hope that helps!
